RT @manwhohasitall: MY DREAM on a T-shirt: That one day boys will become anything they want to be – handsome princes, nurses, cabin crew,…

@Mamaofabean That’s what DH did when he transitioned his job at the hospital to private practice. Went from 5 days, down to 3 days, 2 days then... GONE. 👋🏼 Took about 6 years in total. Could have been faster but we were also busy having babies & that’s a whole other job as you know!

@Mamaofabean Except that’s not how you “make” a new job :) It doesn’t have to be so black/white. Don’t quit your job/sell your house. Not so drastic! Just “nudge” in the direction you want “over time”. It will happen in little baby steps. Then you can begin to pull away from your old job.

@Mamaofabean No, we couldn’t get anything decent in NOTL on such late notice so we stayed near the Falls. First time the kids have been to the Falls so that works too. We spent most of yesterday & dinner in NOTL & will today too.
@Mamaofabean More pics... cute place with a great backyard. I’m enjoying the all pink touches too :) https://t.co/LrnnWLeSrx
@Mamaofabean Stayed here for a night, the kids loved it obvs! #FlamingosAhoy https://t.co/3B7pp3KCzg

@DrJenGunter Also, check your own head. Apparently upwards of 80% of moms will have lice too if their kids do. My DD4 went through this last year. Infested by tween cousin & whole family visiting from UK got it too! Will make a funny family story one day, but nobody was laughing back then.
@DrJenGunter Two words: nit clinic. #outsource #takethatuniverse

@Mamaofabean Yup :)
@emiiilyt I don’t know how a PhD is involved then? But what matters is you are OK, despite being disappointed.

@emiiilyt Your employer is being dumb. Degree requirements are only so good as the skills learned to do the job. If you have the skills, they’re just putting up fake barriers to justify another decision. Also, know there’s no such thing as a “promised promotion”. Only in writing!

I worked in the IT industry for a decade, beginning in 2000... this skill combination was true, even back then, for our most successful & sought-after employees. Ironically, the computer skills were dime a dozen. Human skills much more rare. #HRtweets https://t.co/tGuVjD4mEH
@Mamaofabean Next up? @TEDTalks and @JustinTrudeau :) #OneStepCloser #squeee

RT @victoriawiIson: SHOULD KIDS BE TAUGHT ABOUT MENTAL HEALTH IN SCHOOL?
RT for yes Like for no
Proving a point
@Mamaofabean And I love how old skool you roll with “sky dome”. #RogersCentre ✌🏼
@Mamaofabean This is amazing!! CONGRATS!! 🎉
@bri_norris https://t.co/4FC3seNJvj
@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp He should really stop being such a victim. Rise up, Bill. You can do it. #quack https://t.co/HhEfPmYr1O

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Ahhh of course. Now I get it. You’re not actually a real medical doctor nor a psychologist. You have literally zero training in mental health as a DC. Please. Stay in your lane cracking backs & leave the pep talks up to qualified mental healthcare professionals. #CredibilityGone

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Are you a full or half wit? Read my bio. I work in health care. With patients who live with disabilities none of which are “self erected”. Unless you think getting your head smashed in by a car is just them being a victim? Save your bizarre disconnected platitudes. Try empathy.

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp I would love to hear you tell someone with a physical or mental disability to just “rise up”. Uh, no bro. It doesn’t work that way. Get down from your high chair & connect with them. Try empathy & support. Not everyone lives in your privilege fishbowl.

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Education is a privilege. Herein lies the barrier for some. As a healthcare provider, you can’t provide excellent healthcare if you don’t even notice your patients have barriers & understand how to connect with them. Inclusivity requires you to look beyond your vantage point.

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp The problem with auggesting people just ask for help is those who lack privilege don’t even know who to ask or that they should even be asking something in the first place. That takes awareness that something is even missing. They’re no victims, just totally unaware. Know this.

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Oh dear. Sounds like someone who hasn’t experienced anything but privilege. You are welcome to experience my grade 8 educated elderly in laws from India who barely speak English. Advocate? They can’t even spell it. Please. Get out more & experience beyond your bubble.
@Mamaofabean Lol! I have no idea. #SexBreaksAreTheBestBreaks

@Mamaofabean Also, men don’t rape because they’re “sexually frustrated” or don’t “get enough”. Men who rape are psychopathic assholes who crave power. A doll probably wouldn’t cut it for them since it can’t express fear/lose power.
@Mamaofabean Cum dumpsters? YES.

@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Meaning, not everyone can simply wake up with their cape on, realize that (drumroll please) “they alone are responsible for their health” 💪🏼 & advocate for themselves. To be so empowered/aware/educated/able comes from a place of privilege. It’s not that simple for everyone.
@Mamaofabean Rape and sex are two very different activities. Not sure these are rape outlets?!
@DrBillHowrilla @KellyPediNp Are you asking what I mean by privilege or disagreeing with privilege?

@Mamaofabean @fordnation @TorontoOPS By “this” I mean people dying from a lack of safe injection sites. Not her, specifically. I can appreciate wanting to “persuade” addicts towards rehab but this “solution” only kills them faster before they get the chance. I feel so sorry for all the families losing loved ones.

Safe injection sites keep people alive long enough to get the help they need, which can take years or even a lifetime. This is on you, @fordnation⁩. -> All I know is part of me is gone’: Remembering Ellie Fedak, who died amid Toronto’s overdose crisis. https://t.co/VX7ZNayv4E

@DrJenGunter IMHO, the real tragedy is in the failure of medicine to adequately represent women’s sexual health needs. Goop is a side show distraction piece of fluff. The battle against pseudoscience is better won internally by being more inclusive & strategic. https://t.co/2rp26PHD8l
